base_description: Rectangular white cabinet with multiple compartments.
part_description: Includes four upper compartments and a large front panel. The compartments are evenly spaced and rectangular. The front panel covers the main body and has two small circular elements at the bottom right.
internal_interaction_description: The upper compartments are likely designed to hold smaller items, separated by vertical dividers. The large front panel may open or slide to provide access to a larger storage area within the cabinet. The circular elements could be handles or connectors for opening the panel.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or used as a room divider. It interacts with users who may open the compartments to store or retrieve items. The top surface can hold decorative items or additional storage. It may require assembly and installation.
